1.title: Design & Development
1.description: We provide complimentary shop drawings, top-notch project management and access to our R&D department where you can access prototypes and expert advice on installation.

2.title: Value Engineering
2.description: We understand that the design vision doesnâ€™t always marry up with the budget. We can value-engineer any concept to achieve similar design outcomes within the specified budget.

3.title: Samples
3.description: We have a selection of samples on hand and ready to despatch. But we also offer a custom sample service so that you can see exactly how your specification will look. Order online or give us a call.

4.title: Compliance
4.description: We're all about rigorous product testing and certification in sustainability, fire safety, and acoustics. We've got an all-star line-up of partnerships with specialists in these fields. If there's a certification you're after and we don't have it, we'll do our best to make it happen!

5.title: Local On-Site Support
5.description: The sum of the parts is greater than the whole rings true at Decor Systems. With combined experience more than 100 years, the Decor Systems team are the best in the business.

6.title: Execution & Delivery
6.description: We support you right through until installation and beyond by providing site-specific delivery options and a high degree of prefabrication. Our Customer Care team ensure the delivery process is seamless and your panels come sealed and protected so they arrive in the best condition.
